name: Vord%27lya
content:
Vord'lya was a male Bothan member of the Bothan Spynet and supporter of Borsk Fey'lya's Spynet faction.
In 3 ABY, Vord'lya led a group of Bothans as they ambushed SecOps Four, a Bothan Spynet member of Koth Melan's Spynet faction. SecOps Four, having just escaped a deadly bounty hunter attack on Koth's safehouse on Kothlis, had in his possession the coveted Imperial Death Star II plans. Vord'lya and his subordinates stole the plans and stunned SecOps Four, intending to turn them over to the Alliance to Restore the Republic themselves, ensuring that Borsk Fey'lya's Spynet faction got credit for the espionage coup.
